SELECT IDX,CONTENTS, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT IDX,CONTENTS, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and title like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') and CONTENTS like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT IDX,CONTENTS, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and (title like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') or CONTENTS like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%')) ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT STUDY_IDX, date_format(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_DATE, TITLE,CONTENT FROM study_board ORDER BY STUDY_IDX DESC Limit 4
